hero.description: Professional web development and design services tailored for businesses and individuals who want to stand out in the digital world.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Nihat Onal - Web Developer
about.paragraph1: With over 6 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating beautiful, functional, and responsive websites that help businesses grow their online presence.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines technical expertise with creative design to deliver websites that not only look great but also perform exceptionally well. I'm passionate about clean code, user experience, and helping my clients achieve their digital goals.

footer.title: Creating beautiful web experiences for businesses and individuals around the world.

projects.title: E-commerce Website Redesign
projects.description: A complete redesign and development of an e-commerce platform for a fashion boutique. The project included a custom product catalog, integrated payment systems, and a user-friendly admin dashboard.
projects.challenge: The client's previous website was outdated and not mobile-friendly, resulting in poor conversion rates and customer engagement. They needed a modern, responsive design that would showcase their products effectively and provide a seamless shopping experience.
projects.solution: I developed a custom React-based e-commerce solution with a clean, modern design that adapts perfectly to all screen sizes. The new site includes advanced filtering options, a streamlined checkout process, and integration with their inventory management system.
results: 45% increase in average time on site

testimonial.content: Working with BVS Design transformed our online presence. Our customers love the new website and our sales have increased significantly since the launch.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson, Owner

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website for a professional photographer showcasing their work with beautiful galleries and smooth animations.
projects.challenge: The client needed a visually stunning website that would highlight their photography work without overshadowing the images themselves. The site needed to be fast-loading despite the high-quality images and provide an intuitive navigation experience.
projects.solution: I created a minimalist design with a focus on the photography, implementing lazy loading and image optimization techniques to ensure fast performance. The site features subtle animations and transitions to enhance the viewing experience.
results: Portfolio visitors spend an average of 4+ minutes on the site
Featured on several web design inspiration platforms

testimonial.content: The portfolio website exceeded my expectations. It perfectly showcases my work and has helped me attract new clients from around the world.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen

projects.title: Mobile Application Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for a health monitoring mobile application that tracks and visualizes user fitness and health data.
projects.challenge: The client needed an intuitive dashboard that could display complex health data in an easily understandable format for users with varying levels of technical expertise. The dashboard needed to work across mobile and tablet devices with different screen sizes.
projects.solution: I developed a responsive dashboard using React Native that presents health metrics through customizable charts and graphs. The interface adapts to different devices and provides personalized insights based on user data.
results: Featured in App Store's health category

testimonial.content: The dashboard BVS Design created for our app has been a game-changer. Users love how easily they can track their progress and understand their health data.
testimonial.author: Dr. Lisa Zhang

projects.title: Corporate Website
projects.description: A professional website for an investment firm with secure client portals and interactive financial tools.
projects.challenge: The client required a website that projected professionalism and trustworthiness while providing advanced functionality for their clients, including secure document sharing and financial calculators.
projects.solution: I created a modern corporate website with a clean design that emphasizes reliability and expertise. The site includes secure client portals, interactive financial tools, and comprehensive information about the firm's services.
results: Reduced customer service calls for basic information
Improved client satisfaction with secure portal

testimonial.content: Our new website perfectly represents our brand and has significantly improved how we communicate with clients. The secure portal has been particularly valuable.
testimonial.author: Robert Wilson

projects.title: Restaurant Ordering System
projects.description: An online ordering system for a chain of restaurants allowing customers to place orders for pickup or delivery.
projects.challenge: The restaurant chain needed to transition from third-party delivery apps to their own ordering system to reduce commission fees and have more control over the customer experience. The system needed to handle complex menu options and integrate with their existing POS.
projects.solution: I developed a custom online ordering platform that seamlessly integrates with their point-of-sale system, handles complex menu customizations, and provides real-time order tracking for customers.
results: Improved customer retention through loyalty program integration

testimonial.content: The online ordering system has transformed our business. We're saving thousands on commissions while providing a better experience for our customers.
testimonial.author: Maria Garcia

projects.title: Travel Blog
projects.description: A custom WordPress travel blog with advanced features for a popular travel influencer.
projects.challenge: The client needed a visually appealing blog that could showcase their travel photography and writing while effectively monetizing their audience through advertisements and affiliate partnerships.
projects.solution: I created a custom WordPress theme with optimized ad placements, affiliate link management, and stunning gallery features. The design emphasizes the client's photography while ensuring fast load times and SEO optimization.

testimonial.content: My new blog has completely elevated my brand. It looks professional, loads quickly, and has significantly increased my revenue from affiliate partnerships.
testimonial.author: Jessica Moore

projectDetail.contactText: Have a similar project in mind? Let's talk about how I can help bring your ideas to life.
